00024 #ifndef _READER_HPP_ 
00025 #define _READER_HPP_ 
00026 
00027 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00028 #include "MSData.hpp"
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace msdata {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// interface for file readers
00037 class PWIZ_API_DECL Reader
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     /// return true iff Reader can handle the file; 
00042     /// Reader may filter based on filename and/or head of the file
00043     virtual bool accept(const std::string& filename, 
00044                         const std::string& head) const = 0;
00045 
00046     /// fill in the MSData structure
00047     virtual void read(const std::string& filename, 
00048                       const std::string& head,
00049                       MSData& result) const = 0;
00050 
00051     virtual ~Reader(){}
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 typedef boost::shared_ptr<Reader> ReaderPtr;
00056 
00057 
00058 ///
00059 /// Reader container (composite pattern).  
00060 /// 
00061 /// The template get<reader_type>() gives access to child Readers by type, to facilitate 
00062 /// Reader-specific configuration at runtime. 
00063 ///
00064 class PWIZ_API_DECL ReaderList : public Reader,
00065                                  public std::vector<ReaderPtr>
00066 {
00067     public:
00068 
00069     /// returns true iff some child accepts
00070     virtual bool accept(const std::string& filename, 
00071                         const std::string& head) const; 
00072 
00073     /// delegates to first child that accepts
00074     virtual void read(const std::string& filename, 
00075                       const std::string& head,
00076                       MSData& result) const;
00077 
00078     /// returns pointer to Reader of the specified type
00079     template <typename reader_type>
00080     reader_type* get()
00081     {
00082         for (iterator it=begin(); it!=end(); ++it)
00083         {
00084             reader_type* p = dynamic_cast<reader_type*>(it->get());
00085             if (p) return p;
00086         }
00087         
00088         return 0;
00089     }
00090 
00091     /// returns const pointer to Reader of the specified type
00092     template <typename reader_type>
00093     const reader_type* get() const
00094     {
00095         return const_cast<ReaderList*>(this)->get<reader_type>();
00096     }
00097 };
00098 
00099 
00100 } // namespace msdata
00101 } // namespace pwiz
00102 
00103 
00104 #endif // _READER_HPP_
